title: Interpretation of seeing that I am in front of my prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing that I am an imam praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. The slave is with his master. Therefore, we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article about the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing the prayer leader in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing the prayer leader in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates the seriousness of the dreamer’s religiosity, good morals, and good behavior among his family and friends. Seeing performing prayer in a dream, with many worries and major problems in the dreamer’s life, indicates the death of sorrows from life, his psychological stability, and his ability to solve his problems and get rid of sad days. Seeing prayer in a dream indicates that the dreamer is satisfied with his life and with the many blessings in his life, and that God helps him to achieve it. Achieving his life's dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees the prayer leader in a dream? Seeing a man trying to get closer to God. Maintaining his prayers in a dream and his great need to help those around him indicates his sense of security and great superiority in his academic and professional life. Seeing a married man crying intensely while praying in a dream is a sign of perseverance in success, achieving goals, and staying away from bad friends. Seeing a married person praying in a dream indicates a quiet life full of joy and happiness and trying to stay away from stress and fear. See also: Interpretation of seeing praying in a church in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a single girl praying in a dream? Seeing a single girl praying with a young man she knows in a dream means fulfilling her lifelong dream of marrying her lover and starting a beautiful life with him. Seeing a single girl holding a pen, constantly asking for forgiveness and praying behind a righteous man indicates her husband’s good morals, kindness of heart, and wisdom among people. A girl who sees herself praying with strangers indicates her strong personality and she leads the important things in her life without resorting to anyone else. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream? I see myself praying in a dream while sitting without illness showing his pride in doing good in front of people and that God does not accept any work from him. Seeing prayer in the fortuneteller’s sleep indicates the deterioration of his health and his suffering from many diseases. Seeing myself praying while driving in the car indicates constant fear and anxiety about life and many problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone leading prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Shaheen praying in a dream? The dream. By performing the noon prayer, Ibn Shaheen has visions that herald all goodness, happiness and joy in the future for its owner. Seeing the Eid prayer in a dream means the return of the beloved to the dreamer from travels and the arrival of goodness and sustenance to him. Seeing prayer in a dream is a sign of blessing in food and a lot of money. Seeing the imam of the mosque in a dream is a sign of loss of sadness. And distress and improvement of the material condition of the visions. Seeing long prostration in prayer indicates the ability of the dreamer to achieve amazing successes and everything he wishes for the future. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man praying in a dream? Seeing a young man praying in a dream is

title: Meanings of a dream about choking someone to death

preview.html: The meanings of seeing a dream about a person being strangled to death. Many scholars differed in the interpretations of dreams, and the dream may differ from one person to another. Sometimes a dream is a wake-up call. Usually this dream makes us feel unpleasant feelings, and we stay away from these dreams and dedicate ourselves to reading the Holy Qur’an, remembrance of God, seeking forgiveness, and drawing closer to God Almighty so that the person remains surrounded by the guarantees of God Almighty, and keeps him away from any nightmares or disturbing dreams. Interpretation of a dream about choking someone in a dream? Feeling suffocated in a dream can make you feel upset most of your day, and this is related to your feelings (internally) and self-expression. These feelings may be suppressed or “disappeared”, the dream can be a wake-up call, and tell The most aggressive part of you is not to let yourself worry about life, that things will remain the same for a while, and this dream usually makes us feel unpleasant feelings. Interpretation of a dream about choking someone to deathIf you dream that someone you do not know is choking you, it means that you feel like A little trapped by your situation, maybe you didn't mean it. Being strangled by someone you know is a symbol of dependence on others. Seeing yourself in your dream strangling another person is a reflection of how you would behave in waking life if you suppressed or denied a vital aspect of your expression. Being strangled by Being choked by an animal or being strangled by someone, such as a snake, can represent something in your life that you feel is emotionally restricted. A dream of a boy or girl being strangled expresses your frustration with someone in real life. Sometimes a dream of being choked portends a lack of money, if you are choking If you are involved in strangling someone in a dream, it means that a pleasant surprise is coming your way. Seeing someone drowning means unhappiness, sadness and trouble. A dream in which you want to strangle yourself is a harbinger of big problems and may indicate disagreements in love. To dream of a choking man means that you will face damage and loss, and this is an unpleasant dream that portends trouble. To dream of someone being strangled portends a difficult illness in the future. If other people are strangled in your dream, you may receive an inheritance, as well as career advancement. To dream that you cannot breathe Because someone is trying to suffocate you means that you need to get more fresh air to avoid getting sick. Choking and killing someone in a dream means that you realize that you are intentionally eliminating an aspect of your personality. If you suddenly start killing the person strangely, this is a sign of a problem that is making your life Difficult in real life. If you consciously decided to strangle the character you dreamed of, it means that the situation will lead to despair. Strangling a man and not knowing what to do with a corpse in a dream is a promise that a difficult time will soon come and end, but it will leave a mark forever. If he strangles you A man to death, or if you dreamed that he strangled you to death, this means severe emotional shock and this means that you have decided to end your current love, marriage or professional relationship. If you try to strangle a deceased person, this means that you will choose loneliness, and seeing the deceased at the time of strangulation means that the closest people They will insult you and accuse you

title: Interpretation of eating dates in a dream

preview.html: Eating dates in a dream The interpretation of eating dates in a dream varies with different interpretations, which vary according to the type of dates and also according to their color, and the interpretation varies from one person to another. The interpretation generally varies according to the vision of the dream. Eating dates in a dream The interpretation of the dream varies from one person to another and varies according to the dreamer’s dream vision, as It also varies according to the social status of the dreamer. Eating dates in a dreamDepending on their type, we will learn that through the siteVarious. Eating dates in a dream is considered good news that indicates an extensive diet. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of eating dates in a dream as an indication that the dreamer will acquire wealth Or a big treasure. Ibn Sirin interpreted eating dates in a dream as a sign that the dreamer will enter into a big project and the extent of the success of this advice that will bring him a lot of money. Interpretation scholars interpreted that if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is eating dates of the type of atmosphere This dream indicates that the dreamer will acquire great wealth from several different sources. The interpretation of eating fresh dates in a dream is good news about the approaching sustenance and sustenance from God and the arrival of happiness to the dreamer and his family. When a righteous person sees himself eating dates, this indicates that he is very religious, As for the oppressors, he shows his intention to repent and return to the right path. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams: Eating dates in a dream for an unmarried girl, this is an indication of her husband’s imminent meeting with a good and high man. Also, fresh dates in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates Relief from distress and anxiety for her. Yellow dates in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate the closeness of her husband and the formation of a happy family in the future. If an unmarried girl gives someone yellow dates, this indicates the benefit she will receive from this person. Distributing yellow dates to unmarried women also indicates Married women indicate that they will be connected to a good person and that he will provide for them with a lot of goodness. As for seeing black dates in an unmarried woman’s dream, this means that she will be relieved of physical pain, as well as getting rid of the stress and anxiety that afflicts her, and it will bring her goodness soon. Black dates are distributed to the single girl on the street, which It indicates the coming of days full of joy and happiness for her. As for red dates, it indicates that the dreamer has received good news or received money from a halal source, which Al-Nabulsi explained indicates the success of trade and marriage to a person with high morals. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates in a dream for a single young man. Interpretation of dreams: eating Dates in a dream for a young man are out of season, and the dates are not yet ripe, then this indicates that this young man is learning without benefiting from this knowledge and does not benefit from it. If the young man sees himself collecting dates from palm trees, this indicates that he has married a girl with good morals. But if the young man sees that he He was collecting dates without thinking about marriage at the present time, then this indicates that he has acquired the knowledge that he wants and that will benefit him in the future. But if the young man collects dates without bearing fruit, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about a stranger’s funeral

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a stranger’s funeral in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a stranger’s funeral in a dream for a single girl shows more than one meaning. Among them are those who live in crises and sadness, and severe pain in their lives that they cannot get rid of. Although she was really sad at the funeral in the dream, She has gone through many countless crises in her life. It indicates the fluctuation of her circumstances from sorrows to happiness and goodness and fixed assumptions about her. She will accept a quiet life free of problems and things that are bad and difficult for her. It is explained that the unmarried girl is attending the funeral of a stranger and a stranger to her. The meaning indicates her close marriage to a person close to her and she lives with him happily. The dream indicates the new life that this single girl will accept at this time. As if she was sad for the deceased in the dream, this indicates that she is constantly thinking about bad things in her life. And see Also: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of attending a stranger’s funeral in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees herself sitting at a stranger’s funeral in a dream. It is one of the promising things for her and she will get many benefits in her life. It also indicates that she saw a lot of Goodness and food in this period and that he lived a good life. A married woman looks in a dream at the funeral of someone she does not know and cries bitterly over him. A sign that she is facing a big problem in her life and cannot get over it quickly. The dream indicates that the married woman will try to overcome failure in her life. A married woman is forced to attend and watch the funeral of a stranger in a dream. It indicates that God Almighty will change her condition from bad to good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And that this will put an end to many of the crises that she was going through with her husband during this period of her life. Interpretation of seeing a funeral A stranger in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman attends the funeral of a stranger in a dream, crying bitterly. This indicates that she will enter into major financial crises that are endless and have no limits in this period of her life. It also indicates the many losses that she will face and she will try hard to get rid of them. A divorced woman believes That her divorce forces her to attend a stranger’s funeral. It is interpreted that she will face a big problem with her divorce at this time in her life. And if he does not agree to attend the funeral, it shows that he is thinking wisely about matters that are difficult for her. The dream indicates that the divorced woman will face many changes In her life at this time. She will live in great suffering because of these changes that she will lose. If she is happy in the dream, this indicates the good things that God Almighty will accept. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about funeral prayer in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing the funeral of a stranger in a dream for a man and its meaning. The dreamer believes that He was watching the funeral of a stranger in a dream and crying over him. He declared that God Almighty would make him happy in his life and give him more money and goodness. It also indicates that he did not face the harsh circumstances of his life and always avoided them. And if he looked in a dream at the funeral of a stranger in a dream without

title: I dreamed that I found tracks

preview.html: I dreamed that I found antiquities in a dream through the website roy2a.com, antiquities are historical things dating back to ancient times thousands of years ago, such as the Greeks, Pharaohs and Romans, and the antiquities were buried underground and many of them have been found until now, and we will present to you today through this The article: I dreamed that I found paths. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I found paths in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of finding paths in a dream. It indicates the abundance of goodness and blessings in the life of The dreamer: Seeing that I have antiquities in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will have a great position and a prominent position among the people, and God knows best. A dream about carrying antiquities indicates the emergence of many positive changes in the dreamer’s practical and social life. Pharaonic antiquities in a dream indicate an abundance of good news and happy events in the life of the dreamer. The seer during the coming period. Seeing a treasure trove of many antiquities in a dream shows that the fortuneteller will have a lot of money in the coming period. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing antiquities in a dream. I dreamed that I found antiquities in an unmarried woman’s dream. Seeing single women finding threads in a dream shows that he will get married. Whoever has a lot of money, his life will be full of happiness. A box of antiquities in a single woman’s dream shows that she cannot achieve her goals in life, despite her efforts to achieve it. Holding a statue of antiquities in a person’s dream It indicates that she will be emotionally attached to a person who is not suitable for her and is a liar. Stealing antiquities The Pharaonic woman in a single woman’s dream indicates that there is an evil person in her life who is planning many bad things for her. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream. I dreamed that I found antiquities in a married woman’s dream. Seeing a married woman finding antiquities in a dream indicates her married life full of stability and happiness. Carrying a statue Archeology in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is suffering from envy and hatred from someone close to her, and God knows best. A married woman sees her husband giving her clues in a dream. It indicates promising things happening in her husband’s professional life. Archeology in a married woman’s dream: It indicates her effort to provide comfort for her children and husband. I dreamed that I found traces in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing a pregnant woman finding tracks in a dream announces that she will give birth to a male, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees her child, this gives her traces in a dream. This indicates that her child in the future will have a great position and a high position in society. I dreamed that I found traces In a man’s dream, seeing a man digging and finding antiquities in a dream indicates that he has achieved all his ambitions and goals that he had been striving for for a long time. Important results in the man’s dream, and this indicates that God will bless him with many goodness and blessings in the coming period. Seeing single people owning antiquities in a dream indicates that his marriage is approaching. From a reputable girl. Smuggling antiquities in a man’s dream

title: Seeing the birth of a goat in a dream

preview.html: It differs from one person to another in its interpretation, whether it is a good or bad interpretation and it is for a man, woman, young man or girl, so we will explain the interpretation of the vision via the website gptafser.com/. So follow us. Interpretation of seeing a goat giving birth in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a goat giving birth in her dream, this is a good and promising vision for her and indicates her marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream tending a goat or holding it in her arms, this is one of the good visions that portends the fulfillment of Her ambitions. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that she is cooking goats, this is a vision that bodes well, and indicates the end of her worries, sorrows, and sadness. Interpretation of watching a goat giving birth in a dream for a married woman. If a pregnant woman sees that a goat is giving birth in a dream, this indicates the approaching time of labor and childbirth. A married woman who sees a goat giving birth in a dream portends the good news of childbirth or pregnancy in the near future, God willing. The vision may indicate pregnancy with twins, because goats have two to three births. Seeing a married woman slaughtering or eating a cooked goat in her dream indicates the fulfillment of her desires and dreams. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cooking goats, this indicates the disappearance of her worries, anxieties, troubles, and problems. Seeing a married woman with a goat in her dream indicates that her dreams will come true. Her dream of giving birth to a child will come true soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing goats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a vision. The birth of a goat in a dream for a man and its meaning. The birth of a goat to a baby goat is a good sign. He will receive a lot of sustenance, kindness, and abundance of money in the coming days. The birth of a goat in the dream of a man who wants to have a child indicates good news of the imminent pregnancy for him and his wife. What if this person is He is about to get a new job and witnessed the birth of a goat while he was sleeping. This is good news for him to obtain this project and achieve great profits and many achievements in this project. Seeing a man in a dream sees a goat giving birth to more than one goat. This is one of the harbingers of multiple offspring that the owner will obtain. Vision. If the dreamer is suffering from anxiety, stability, and severe anxiety. The birth of a goat in a dream represents relief after distress, and the approach of joy and happiness. Watching the birth of a goat in a dream indicates multiple lawful livelihoods that will soon appear before this person. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a goat for a married man It shows good skin for him. Many happy and enjoyable occasions are approaching for him in the coming period. If the person in the vision is sick, the goat will give birth to a baby goat, which means that he will soon recover from this disease. The meaning of seeing the birth of a goat in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretationIf a pregnant woman dreams With a goat looking at its belly, this means that the fetus is in good health. And a healthy child will be born, God willing. A pregnant woman seeing a goat in her dream means that there are many people around her who do not wish her well. This woman who has a dream must be careful in dealing with People close to her. Because there may be those among them who do not want good. Seeing a woman carrying goats entering

title: Interpretation of seeing urinating in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing urinating in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates surprise and astonishment for many people who dream about it and makes them search and wonder a lot: What are the connotations of this vision and does it indicate good or bad? This is what we will explain through this article in the following lines, so that the dreamer’s heart will be reassured and he will not be distracted by many different interpretations. Seeing urinating in a dream The interpretation of seeing urinating in a dream indicates that the dreamer will feel comfort and kindness in the coming periods to compensate him for all the difficult and bad periods that he experienced. He was going through it. Seeing urinating in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all the problems and crises that were happening in his life and the reason why he felt anxious and sad all the time, which is why he was in a state of stress all together. Time. In the event that a man sees himself urinating in his dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money and large amounts and this will be the reason that he will be able to significantly improve his standard of living in the coming periods. Seeing the same person urinating on Laban in his dream, this indicates That God will open many huge sources of livelihood for her, which will be a reason for her to earn many huge amounts of money, which will be a reason for material and social increase. Of the amounts. The level significantly increased in the following periods. If a person sees urine in separate places in a dream, this symbolizes his inability to escape his sense of responsibility towards all the people around him and this always makes him beyond his capacity. Seeing urination in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing urination In a dream, it means that the dreamer will get rid of all the problems and crises that were occurring in his life and the cause of his anxiety and sadness all the time. If merchants see urine on a certain commodity in a dream, this is a sign that he will suffer a great loss in that commodity. Seeing a person eating urine In his dream, there is evidence that God will fill his life with many blessings and gifts that will make him praise God and thank God for the abundance of blessings in his life. If a person sees himself urinating while standing in a dream, this means that he is wasting a lot of money on things that will not benefit him at all and should He is very careful not to lose a large part of his property. During the following periods. Seeing urinating in a dream for a single woman. Seeing urinating in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will be able to escape from all the crises and problems that occurred in her life permanently and continuously in the previous periods, and this always put her in a state of tension and anxiety. In the event that the girl sees Seeing herself urinating in her dream is a sign that she will overcome all the obstacles and obstacles that stood in her way and will make her unable to achieve her great dreams and aspirations. Seeing the same girl unable to control her urine in her dream indicates that she is constantly making a lot of quick and random decisions. That's why she has a lot of problems all the time that she can't get rid of easily

title: I dreamed that my husband was cheating on me, what are the consequences of this vision?

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband was cheating on me, so what are the pros and cons of this vision in detail? Women who dream of cheating on their husbands are afraid of this dream and are desperately searching for an accurate interpretation of the dream to know all the details. Many jurists say that the vision of betrayal has many meanings, including good and bad. Secrets of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a husband cheating on his wife in a dream. Seeing a husband cheating on his wife in a dream may indicate that she overthinks her marital relationship, because she always doubts her husband and searches behind him for any evidence of his vigilance. When a married woman dreams that her husband took her wedding ring and broke it And he goes to another woman and puts the wedding ring on her finger, then she may divorce him and marry another woman. If the dreamer meets her friends awake and they talk about infidelity and the dreamer feels afraid of this topic and continues to think about it until the end of the day, if she dreams tonight that her husband is cheating on her, dream that she will be Just events that are stored by the subconscious and appear in the form of dreams or nightmares. Whoever dreams of a woman giving her husband beautiful clothes and taking them from her, then the dream is one of the confirmed visions of betrayal that the husband commits to his wife in reality. If the dreamer is afraid of the pain of separation and loves her husband deeply, she may sometimes see him die in reality. The dream, and at other times, betrays her and goes to another person, and all of these dreams are false fears, and if the dreamer does not do it. Expelling her from her mind, will disturb her life. Betrayal by a husband in a dream sometimes indicates his betrayal of his living conditions and the dreamer’s life, which means that her luxurious life will turn into a problem and the money she had will decrease, and this problem is a test from the worlds of their Lord, and if they persevere and succeed, God will give them double. What they lost before.Interpretation of a dream about my husband cheating on me in Ibn SirinIbn Sirin showed that the symbol of betrayal in a dream, whether between spouses or friends, or in any situation in life, is a bad symbol that is interpreted with the appearance of something that will happen either to the dreamer or to the traitor in the dream.Interpretation Ibn Sirin, who dreams of a husband cheating on his wife, warns the dreamer of the exhausting trials that she will experience if she sees her husband cheating on her and she starts screaming to the heavens to obtain her rights. But if the man is the one who dreams of knowing women other than his wife, and he commits immorality with her of his own free will, then he is walking on the forbidden path without Forced to do so, and unfortunately it ends. The road is hell and the torment of hellfire. I dreamed that my husband was cheating on me, so what is the meaning of this dream? I dreamed that my husband was cheating on me while I was pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who cheated on his pregnant wife could indicate warnings if he sees him putting another mattress in her bedroom and a woman sleeping on that bed enters and the husband has sex with her This is in a relationship. To a woman in reality and he will marry her, and perhaps the scene indicates his actual marriage to this woman some time ago. If the dreamer sees her husband cheating on her and looks at her hand and finds that she is wearing two rings instead of one, then this dream warns her of what will happen to her in the future (knowing that God is the only one who He knows the unseen.) But dreams are a gift from the Lord of the Worlds who sends us good news

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a red coat in a dream for a single girl: A woman is the opposite of a man, so it is undesirable for a man to see the color red in a dream. As for a single woman, seeing the color red indicates happiness, kindness, and living. If a single woman dreams of wearing a red dress, this indicates Romance and passion, and that she will live a beautiful love story. But if she sees that she is wearing a red coat of cotton or wool, then this dream indicates the presence of warm feelings between her and her lover. The color red in general in the clothes of free people, regardless of the type of clothing, indicates that this woman is bright and full of energy. With positive energy and good feelings. Whoever sees that she is wearing the color red in a dream, this indicates her intelligence, creativity, and ability to overcome difficulties and achieve her dream. Seeing the color red in a dream for a single woman also shows her attractiveness and that she has her own strength through which she can influence everyone around her. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing a coat in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a red coat in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman sees herself wearing the color red in her dream, this indicates that this woman is full of energy, activity, vitality, and her ability to accomplish many things. The color red indicates for a married woman To solve financial difficulties, increase income, and open doors that were closed to earn money and indicate prosperity in financial matters. When a married woman sees herself wearing long dresses or red robes, this indicates harmony, love, affection, and increased passion in married life. But when you see her wearing a red dress But it is short, this does not deserve praise at all. Because it indicates the presence of difficulties and problems between them and relatives, husband, or family. As for other things that are red in color, such as coats, socks, shirts, shoes, and the like, for a married woman to see them is something worthy of praise. It indicates the ability to earn and earn a living. Interpretation of seeing a red coat in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant woman wearing red in her dream is like seeing a married woman. It also indicates goodness, abundance of earning, and abundant sustenance, God willing. If the pregnant woman is sick, then seeing her in a dream Red. It indicates her recovery, alleviation of her pain, and compensation for her birth, which will comfort her eyes, God willing. There is a vision that says that seeing a pregnant woman in her dream is because she is wearing a red coat. It appears that she is feminine because the color red is a symbol of femininity and a symbol of soft power as well. We chose for you: Interpretation of dreams about buying new clothes for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about a red coat in a dream about a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream in red indicates that God Almighty will grant her bond and compensate her for the loss she suffered in the previous days, God willing. It was also said that seeing the color red indicates that she She will marry a man of good character and good reputation who will be her support and alternative and who will always defend and protect her. And if the divorced woman sees that she is wearing red clothes

title: Interpretation of seeing old clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream about clothes is one of the dreams that many people search for interpretations, and there are many situations for this dream. Through this article, we will provide the interpretation of seeing old clothes in a dream, apart from providing detailed interpretations according to the gender of the person and based on the social status, as the interpretation varies from one person to another. You can see clothes being bought and sold and you can see that others are wearing them. All of these questions will be answered in detail through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing old clothes in a dream: Seeing old clothes has many connotations, as it may be a sign of sorrows and problems surrounding the dreamer. It can indicate a person’s inner desire to return to an old life, or rather to A period of time that he lived. It may indicate that a person or an old friend will return from traveling after immigration. It also varies in whether it is related to the reception or presentation. This may indicate that the elderly person will return after a dispute to reconcile, especially if you find that these clothes are displayed in a Good and organized. But if you find that old clothes are torn, this symbolizes the death or illness of someone close to you. Seeing old clothes symbolizes goodness in any case, so there is no need to worry. But if you find that these old clothes are torn, this indicates that there is A problem or a rip, for example. If you see that these clothes are very old, this indicates unhappiness and unhappiness. When you see that you see old clothes and then try to get rid of them, this indicates that you are trying to get rid of the past and the negative pains that you have experienced. It also indicates that That some changes will occur in your life because it can symbolize travel or moving from one place to another. When you dream that you are getting rid of old clothes, this is a sign of kindness and livelihood that will come your way. Seeing someone I know wearing old clothes in a dream When you see that there is someone wearing Worn clothes that look old, this is evidence that there are some problems that do not leave that person and he cannot get rid of them. You can indicate that this person, if you know him and have not met him for a while, indicates that you will meet again after a long wait. It also indicates That this person may be transgressive in his worship. It indicates the presence of some financial problems that may end soon, as well as a sign of tension and distress. The interpretation of seeing clothes cut in a dream is a sign of evil, and this dream may indicate the presence of magic or envy. It may be due to Hatred or malice from someone around him and it could be an indication of the presence of magic in the house. So the bottom line of what was said is that this vision has two sides, either goodness or the month of goodness, is that you will see an old friend after a long period of not seeing him, either it can indicate To poverty or change the situation for the worse. Interpretation of selling old clothes in a dream for a single woman. Many interpreters presented different interpretations of dreams for clothes, especially Maha’s old clothes. Some suggested that the meaning of the dream for a single woman indicates selection.
